author: ryanleeschneider
content: This sounds good to me.  Will goerli have some sort of POA-style restriction on who can proposed blocks after the merge or will it change to "normal" POS?  IMO Goerli should be open to anyone to propose while Sepolia should be restricted so client devs can coordinate mock network failures etc. but I'm totally open to arguments for a different setup.

author: timbeiko
content: I think Goerli would keep going along with Prater, which AIUI is open to anyone to join, but mostly controlled by client teams + EF in practice, so as to generally be finalizing.
